bug.author: psesr
bug.description:
Tried Chrome and Firefox, both in Incognito mode:
Firefox just gives me a white screen Chrome: "Access to doc-14-2k-docs.googleusercontent.com was denied"
This happens for any Linux release before 0.9.5 from the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/releases>releases page</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: I can't reproduce this error. Could it be a temporary problem with google drive? Does the problem persist?
It seems to work again now, might have been a temporary issue.
